      • withDefaultEventAction

        public <T extends EventAction> EventLoggerBuilder.WorkStep<T> withDefaultEventAction​(T defaultEventAction)
        Specified by:
        withDefaultEventAction in interface EventLoggerBuilder.EventActionStep
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of event action that will be logged, e.g. SearchEventAction, ViewEventAction, etc.
        Parameters:
        defaultEventAction - The action of the logged event, see EventAction. This event action will be used on the event unless one of the following methods is used which can override it: EventLoggerBuilder.WorkStep.withComplexLoggedAction(Function) EventLoggerBuilder.WorkStep.withComplexLoggedResult(Function) EventLoggerBuilder.OptionalMethods.withCustomExceptionHandler(LoggedWorkExceptionHandler)
        Returns:
        A builder instance.

      • withComplexLoggedResult

        public <T_RESULT> EventLoggerBuilder.ResultSubBuilder<T_EVENT_ACTION,​T_RESULT> withComplexLoggedResult​(java.util.function.Function<T_EVENT_ACTION,​ComplexLoggedOutcome<T_RESULT,​T_EVENT_ACTION>> loggedWork)
        Specified by:
        withComplexLoggedResult in interface EventLoggerBuilder.WorkStep<T_EVENT_ACTION extends EventAction>
        Type Parameters:
        T_RESULT - The type of the result of the work.
        Parameters:
        loggedWork - A lambda to perform the work that is being logged and to return the EventAction , the result of the work and the outcome. This allows a new EventAction to be returned based on the result of the work. The skeleton EventAction is passed in to allow it to be copied. The result of the work must be returned within a ComplexLoggedOutcome along with the desired EventAction.
        Returns:
        The builder instance.

      • withSimpleLoggedResult

        public <T_RESULT> EventLoggerBuilder.ResultSubBuilder<T_EVENT_ACTION,​T_RESULT> withSimpleLoggedResult​(java.util.function.Supplier<T_RESULT> loggedWork)
        Specified by:
        withSimpleLoggedResult in interface EventLoggerBuilder.WorkStep<T_EVENT_ACTION extends EventAction>
        Type Parameters:
        T_RESULT - The type of the result of the work.
        Parameters:
        loggedWork - A simple Supplier to perform the work that is being logged and to return the result of the work. The outcome will be assumed to be a success unless an exception is thrown.
        Returns:
        The builder instance.

      • withComplexLoggedAction

        public EventLoggerBuilder.ActionSubBuilder<T_EVENT_ACTION> withComplexLoggedAction​(java.util.function.Function<T_EVENT_ACTION,​ComplexLoggedOutcome<java.lang.Void,​T_EVENT_ACTION>> loggedAction)
        Specified by:
        withComplexLoggedAction in interface EventLoggerBuilder.WorkStep<T_EVENT_ACTION extends EventAction>
        Parameters:
        loggedAction - A lambda to perform the work that is being logged and to return the outcome. This allows a new EventAction to be returned based on the result of the work. The skeleton EventAction is passed in to allow it to be copied. The result of the work must be returned within a ComplexLoggedOutcome along with the desired EventAction.
        Returns:
        The builder instance.

      • withSimpleLoggedAction

        public EventLoggerBuilder.ActionSubBuilder<T_EVENT_ACTION> withSimpleLoggedAction​(java.lang.Runnable loggedAction)
        Specified by:
        withSimpleLoggedAction in interface EventLoggerBuilder.WorkStep<T_EVENT_ACTION extends EventAction>
        Parameters:
        loggedAction - A simple Runnable to perform the work that is being logged. The outcome will be assumed to be a success unless an exception is thrown.
        Returns:
        The builder instance.
